```{r define_paths, include = FALSE}

# only path_observations needs to be changed to model

  paste(path_observations, "preprocessing/", sep = "")
```

```{r load_libraries_specific, include = FALSE}
library(scales)

```

# Version ID

The results displayed on this site correspond to the Version_ID: `r params$Version_ID`

# Data sources

dcant estimates from this sensitivity case:

- Mean and SD per grid cell (lat, lon, depth)
- Zonal mean and SD (basin, lat, depth)
- Inventories (lat, lon)


```{r read_dcant_files}

dcant_inv_read <-
  read_csv(paste(path_version_data,
                 "dcant_inv.csv",
                 sep = ""))

dcant_inv_mod_truth <-
  read_csv(paste(path_version_data,
                 "dcant_inv_mod_truth.csv",
                 sep = ""))

dcant_inv_cstar <-
  read_csv(paste(path_version_data,
                 "dcant_inv_cstar.csv",
                 sep = ""))

dcant_inv <- bind_rows(dcant_inv_read, dcant_inv_mod_truth)
dcant_inv_cstar <- bind_rows(dcant_inv_read, dcant_inv_cstar)

dcant_inv_method <-
  read_csv(paste(path_version_data,
                 "dcant_inv_method.csv",
                 sep = ""))

dcant_inv_mod_truth_method <-
  read_csv(paste(path_version_data,
                 "dcant_inv_mod_truth_method.csv",
                 sep = ""))

dcant_inv_method <- bind_rows(dcant_inv_method, dcant_inv_mod_truth_method)

```

The following analysis is restricted to the standard inventory depth of `r params_global$inventory_depth_standard` m.

```{r filter_standard_inventory_depth}

dcant_inv <- dcant_inv %>%
  filter(inv_depth == params_global$inventory_depth_standard)

dcant_inv_cstar <- dcant_inv_cstar %>%
  filter(inv_depth == params_global$inventory_depth_standard)

dcant_inv_method <- dcant_inv_method %>%
  filter(inv_depth == params_global$inventory_depth_standard)

```



# dcant - positive

In a first series of plots we explore the distribution of dcant, taking only positive estimates into account (positive here refers to the mean dcant estimate across MLR model predictions available for each grid cell). Negative values were set to zero before calculating mean sections and inventories.

Column inventory of positive dcant between the surface and `r params_global$inventory_depth`m water depth per horizontal grid cell (lat x lon).

```{r dcant_pos_inventory_map, fig.asp=0.5}

dcant_pos_inv_bias <- dcant_inv %>%
  filter(data_source %in% c("mod", "mod_truth")) %>%
  select(lat, lon, data_source, dcant_pos) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = data_source,
              values_from = dcant_pos) %>%
  mutate(dcant_pos_bias = mod - mod_truth) %>% 
  drop_na()

p_map_cant_inv(
    df = dcant_pos_inv_bias,
    var = "dcant_pos_bias",
    col = "bias",
    subtitle_text = "data_source: mod - mod_truth")


dcant_inv %>%
  group_split(data_source) %>%
  # head(1) %>%
  map(
    ~ p_map_cant_inv(
    df = .x,
    var = "dcant_pos",
    subtitle_text = paste("data_source:", unique(.x$data_source))
  ))

```

# dcant - all

In a second series of plots we explore the distribution of all dcant, taking positive and negative estimates into account.

Column inventory of all dcant between the surface and `r params_global$inventory_depth_standard`m water depth per horizontal grid cell (lat x lon).

```{r dcant_all_inventory_map, fig.asp=0.5}

dcant_inv_bias <- dcant_inv %>%
  filter(data_source %in% c("mod", "mod_truth")) %>%
  select(lat, lon, data_source, dcant) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = data_source,
              values_from = dcant) %>%
  mutate(dcant_bias = mod - mod_truth) %>% 
  drop_na()

p_map_cant_inv(
    df = dcant_inv_bias,
    var = "dcant_bias",
    col = "bias",
    subtitle_text = "data_source: mod - mod_truth")

dcant_inv %>%
  group_split(data_source) %>%
  # head(1) %>% 
  map(~ p_map_cant_inv(
    df = .x,
      var = "dcant",
      col = "continuous",
    subtitle_text = paste("data_source:", unique(.x$data_source))
  ))

```

## Surface

```{r test_surface_data}

surface_data <- nrow(dcant_inv_method %>% filter(method == "surface")) > 0

```


```{r dcant_all_inventory_map_method, fig.asp=0.5, eval=surface_data}

dcant_inv_bias_method <- dcant_inv_method %>%
  filter(data_source %in% c("mod", "mod_truth"),
         method == "surface") %>%
  select(lat, lon, data_source, dcant) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = data_source,
              values_from = dcant) %>%
  mutate(dcant_bias = mod - mod_truth) %>% 
  drop_na()

p_map_cant_inv(
    df = dcant_inv_bias_method,
    var = "dcant_bias",
    col = "bias",
    subtitle_text = "Surface only | data_source: mod - mod_truth",
    # breaks = c(-Inf, seq(-3,3,0.5), Inf)
    )

dcant_inv_method %>%
  filter(method == "surface") %>%
  group_split(data_source) %>%
  # head(1) %>%
  map( ~ p_map_cant_inv(
    df = .x,
    var = "dcant",
    col = "continuous",
    subtitle_text = paste("data_source:", unique(.x$data_source)),
    breaks = c(-Inf,seq(0,4,0.5), Inf)
  ))

```

# Write files

```{r write_csv}

full_join(dcant_inv_bias %>% select(-c(mod, mod_truth)),
          dcant_pos_inv_bias %>% select(-c(mod, mod_truth))) %>%
  write_csv(paste0(path_version_data,
                   "dcant_inv_bias.csv"))

if (surface_data){
dcant_inv_bias_method %>%
  write_csv(paste0(path_version_data,
                   "dcant_inv_bias_method.csv"))
}

```
